edu.matc.persistence

Class AffirmationDaoTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.matc.persistence.AffirmationDaoTest

  • public class AffirmationDaoTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test class for the affirmation dao tests. Clears the test database, creates test data, and tests all affirmation dao functions.
    Since:
    10/24/16.
    Author:
    Todd Kinsman
